Title: A Life Not to Follow
Writer: Pedro Alvarado, Christopher Di Nunzio, Christopher Di Nunzio (story), Christopher Di Nunzio, Pedro Alvarado (story), Pedro Alvarado
Actors: Michael Capozzi, Fiore Leo, Molly Kay, David Graziano
Plot: A hitman, a gangster and a private detective share an interlacing narrative about common human frailty.
